title: Vehicle registrations and inspection reports
dataVerified: Owner name, VIN, license plate number, vehicle make/model/year, registration expiration date, jurisdiction
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Roadside verification by law enforcement without backend queries. Paper registration remains human-readable. Prevents registration fraud and stolen vehicle re-titling. Domain binding to state DMV. Officers verify without accessing full vehicle history unless authorized.
